fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose two players to put through a social experiment tonight during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Both of your targets will be roleblocked through immunity and will be notified that they were put in a social experiment. They will also be notified what their role in the experiment is based on the next attribute.
- The first target will have a choice of killing either themselves or the other player. If they do not make a decision, they will automatically kill themselves. This player will deal an Astral Powerful attack to whoever they kill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who may oppose you.
